caption:
This photograph shows a dramatic and intense scene of a volcanic eruption at night. The main feature is a massive, fiery explosion emitting from the volcano. The eruption is illuminating the dark sky and clouds above with bright orange and red colors. Below, these intense colors reflect vividly on the surface of a body of water, enhancing the dramatic impact of the scene.

The body of water appears dark but is aglow with the reflections of the volcanic fire, creating a mirror-like effect that contrasts sharply with the fiery sky. There are no visible structures or people in the image, focusing all attention on the natural spectacle. The scene captures the raw and fierce power of nature, showcasing the beauty and danger of volcanic activity. The surrounding area is shrouded in darkness, emphasizing the glowing eruption and its reflection.
title: A texaco crude oil tank blazes against the night after being struck by lightning
